page.title: 02HETTON LYONS CRICKET CLUB
page.content: Hetton Lyons Cricket Club was founded in 1865. The ground was originally owned by Bowes Lyons family. In 1965 it was purchased from them by the Cricket Club. They play in the Durham Coast league and the first team were the first ever side to win the league in 1926 since then, the first team have won it a{record eight times}and have also shared with Hylton Colliery Welfare. The second team also holds the record of champion ships with ten in Division 2. There are 8 cups for the first team to play in, and 4 cups for the second team. Altogether there are{six}different{cricket teams}at the Lyons, these being the first team, second team, third team, under-18's, under-15's and the under-13's.
